backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all data types (FoodEntry, Product, Order, Workout, Video, NewsArticle, RunningSession, etc.) and including authorization and blob storage mixins for the fitness platform backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three features: replacing external API dependencies with mock data in Store page, adding search input with debouncing, and updating useGetExternalSportsProducts hook to return mock data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components and pages including Store, Workout Tracker, FiTube, Navigation with global search, product cards, filters, and various feature pages.
frontend/.env.example: Environment variable template defining configuration for Go Store API, fitness search API, sports products API, and fitness videos API with placeholder URLs and keys.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, accent, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation describing FIT AMIGO features (e-commerce, workout tracking, FiTube), external API integrations (Go Store, fitness search, sports products), and setup instructions for environment variables.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes including Store, ProductDetail, Cart, Checkout, Orders, WorkoutTracker, Admin, FiTube, RunningMonitor, FoodTracker, and SearchResults pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access denied error screen with a shield icon, customizable message, and a button to return to the store.
frontend/src/components/AddNewsArticleDi: Dialog form for adding news articles with support for internal/external article types, image uploads with progress tracking, and category selection.
frontend/src/components/AdminProductForm: Form component for adding or editing products with fields for name, description, price, quantity, and image upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/CartItem.tsx: Displays a single cart item with product image, quantity controls (increment/decrement), remove button, and calculated item total.
frontend/src/components/CartSummary.tsx: Shows order summary card with subtotal, 10% tax calculation, and total price for the shopping cart.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutForm.tsx: Form component for checkout with shipping address fields (street, city, state, zip) and contact information (phone, email) with validation.
frontend/src/components/ComingSoon.tsx: Displays a coming soon placeholder page with a rocket icon, feature name, description, and Phase 2 & 3 badge.
frontend/src/components/DeleteNewsArticl: Confirmation dialog for deleting news articles with article title display and delete action using mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/EditNewsArticleD: Dialog form for editing existing news articles that loads article data and supports updating all article fields including image uploads.
frontend/src/components/FoodEntryCard.ts: Displays a single food entry with nutritional information (calories, protein, carbs, fat) and a delete button with confirmation dialog. Formats timestamps and uses toast notifications for user feedback.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component that includes navigation, profile setup modal, footer with caffeine.ai attribution, and toast notifications. Renders children or Outlet for nested routes.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that toggles between login and logout states using Internet Identity. Handles authentication errors and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/MacroSummaryCard: Displays aggregated daily nutrition totals (calories, protein, carbs, fat) from food entries with icon-decorated cards. Calculates sums from an array of FoodEntry objects.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Main navigation header with logo, desktop/mobile menus, search bar with debouncing, and conditional admin link. Includes links to Store, FiTube, Workout, Running, Food, and News sections.
frontend/src/components/OrderCard.tsx: Clickable card component displaying order summary information including order ID, status badge, date, item count, and total price. Links to detailed order view.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Badge component that displays order status (pending, processing, shipped, delivered) with color-coded styling based on the status value.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card component supporting both internal and external products with conditional rendering for images, links, and external badges. Includes add-to-cart functionality and displays price, stock, and description.
frontend/src/components/ProductFilters.t: Filter panel component with category dropdown (gym equipment, running gear, supplements, etc.) and max price input field. Controlled components with callback props for state management.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to create one by entering their name and email. Uses Internet Identity authentication and displays validation errors via toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/RunningSessionCa: Card component displaying a running session with distance, duration, date, and optional notes. Includes a delete button with confirmation dialog and formats timestamps and durations for display.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Card component that displays either internal or external fitness videos with thumbnails, titles, uploader info, and engagement metrics. Clicking navigates to video details or opens external links in new tabs.
frontend/src/components/VideoCommentsSec: Comment section component for videos that displays existing comments with user profiles and timestamps, allows authenticated users to add new comments, and enables comment owners to delete their own comments.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutCard.tsx: Card component that displays a single workout entry showing exercise name, sets, reps, and weight in a grid layout with color-coded metrics.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutForm.tsx: Form component using react-hook-form for logging workouts with fields for exercise name, sets, reps, and weight. Includes validation and loading states during submission.
frontend/src/config/api.ts: Configuration file that exports environment variables for external API URLs and keys (Go Store, Sports Products, Fitness Videos) and provides helper functions to check if each API is configured.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Automatically invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddComment.ts: Mutation hook for adding comments to videos that invalidates related queries on success. Currently throws an error as the backend method is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddNewsArticle.ts: React Query mutation hook for adding a news article; currently throws an error as the backend method is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddProduct.ts: React Query mutation hook for adding a product; currently throws an error as the backend method is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddToCart.ts: React Query mutation hook for adding items to cart; currently throws an error as the backend method is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteComment.ts: React Query mutation hook for deleting video comments; currently throws an error as the backend method is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteFoodEntry.ts: React Query mutation hook that calls the backend actor to delete a food entry and invalidates related queries on success.
React Query mutation hook for deleting a news article; currently throws an error as the backend method is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteProduct.ts: React Query mutation hook for deleting a product; currently throws an error as the backend method is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteRunningSessi: React Query mutation hook that calls the backend actor to delete a running session and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditFoodEntry.ts: React Query mutation hook that calls the backend actor to edit a food entry and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditNewsArticle.ts: React Query mutation hook for updating a news article; currently throws an error as the backend method is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditProduct.ts: React Query mutation hook for editing a product; currently throws an error as the backend method is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useExternalSearch.ts: React Query hook that fetches external fitness search results from the backend actor, parsing JSON and transforming to ExternalSearchResult format.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCart.ts: React Query hook for fetching cart items; currently returns an empty array as the backend method is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetExternalFitness: React Query hook that returns mock fitness video data for demonstration purposes without requiring external API configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetExternalProduct: React Query hook that fetches external products from Go Store API via backend actor, with configuration checks and JSON parsing.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetExternalSportsP: React Query hook that returns mock sports products data filtered by category and search term for demonstration purposes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetFoodEntry.ts: React Query hook that fetches a single food entry by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetNewsArticle.ts: React Query hook that fetches a single news article by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetNewsArticles.ts: React Query hook that fetches all news articles with optional category filtering from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetOrder.ts: React Query hook that fetches a single order by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetProduct.ts: React Query hook that fetches a single product by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetUserFoodEntries: React Query hook that fetches all food entries for the authenticated user from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetUserOrders.ts: React Query hook that fetches all orders for the authenticated user from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetUserProfile.ts: React Query hook that fetches a user profile by Principal ID using the actor, enabled only when actor is ready and userId is provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetUserRunningSess: React Query hook that fetches the authenticated user's running sessions, enabled only when actor and identity are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetVideo.ts: React Query hook that fetches a single video by ID using a workaround of filtering getAllVideos results, enabled when actor is ready and videoId is provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetVideoComments.t: React Query hook that fetches comments for a specific video by ID, enabled when actor is ready and videoId is provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetVideos.ts: React Query hook that fetches all videos from the backend actor, enabled when actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetWorkouts.ts: React Query hook that fetches workouts for the authenticated user, enabled when actor and identity are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useHasLikedVideo.ts: React Query hook that checks if the authenticated user has liked a specific video, enabled when actor, identity, and videoId are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity state management, and AuthClient integration for ICP authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: React Query hook that checks if the authenticated caller has admin privileges, enabled when actor and identity are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useLikeVideo.ts: React Mutation hook for liking a video that throws an error indicating the backend method is not yet implemented, invalidates video-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogFood.ts: React Mutation hook for logging food entries that throws an error indicating the backend method is not yet implemented, invalidates food entries query on success.
React Mutation hook that logs a running session with distance, duration, and notes, invalidating the running sessions query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogWorkout.ts: React Mutation hook that logs a workout to the backend, invalidating the workouts query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceOrder.ts: React Mutation hook that places an order with a shipping address, invalidating cart and orders queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating that all query hooks are defined in separate files.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: React Mutation hook that saves the authenticated user's profile, invalidating the current user profile query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSearchContent.ts: React Query hook that searches content by term, enabled when actor is ready and search term is at least 2 characters.
frontend/src/hooks/useSearchProducts.ts: React Query hook that searches products by term using the actor, enabled when actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnlikeVideo.ts: React Mutation hook for unliking a video that throws an error indicating the backend method is not yet implemented, invalidates video-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUploadVideo.ts: React Mutation hook that uploads a video with title, description, and file blob, invalidating the videos query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes, including vibrant fitness-themed color variables (energetic-orange, vibrant-green, bold-red, sunny-yellow) and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/AddFood.tsx: Food logging page with search functionality (currently mocked) that allows authenticated users to search for foods, select them, adjust serving sizes, and log them to their food diary.
frontend/src/pages/AddRunningSession.tsx: Page component for logging a new running session with a form that captures distance, duration, and optional notes, then navigates back to the running monitor on success.
frontend/src/pages/AddWorkout.tsx: Page component for logging a new workout using the WorkoutForm component, submitting exercise name, sets, reps, and weight data to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard landing page that checks admin permissions and displays navigation cards for product management and news management features.
frontend/src/pages/AdminNewsManagement.t: Admin page for managing news articles with table view, add/edit/delete dialogs, category labels, and article type badges (internal/external).
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductManagemen: Admin page for managing internal products with table view, add/edit/delete functionality, and dialogs for product CRUD operations.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart page displaying cart items with quantity controls, removal functionality, and a checkout button with cart summary.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page with shipping address form and cart summary that places orders and navigates to order confirmation on success.
frontend/src/pages/FiTube.tsx: FiTube page component that displays a grid of fitness videos (both internal and external), with authentication check, loading states, and an upload button for logged-in users.
frontend/src/pages/FoodTracker.tsx: Food tracking page that shows a macro summary card and list of user's food entries for the day, with authentication check and ability to log new meals.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Order confirmation page that displays order details including shipping address, items count, and total price after a successful purchase.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetail.tsx: Detailed order view page showing order status, shipping address, individual order items with product details, and total price.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistory.tsx: Order history page that lists all user orders with authentication check, displaying empty state when no orders exist.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page showing product image, description, price, availability, and add-to-cart functionality with authentication check.
frontend/src/pages/RunningMonitor.tsx: Running monitor page displaying user's running sessions with statistics summary cards showing total runs, distance, and duration, plus authentication check.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResults.tsx: Displays search results grouped by content type (products, videos, articles, workouts, etc.) from both internal and external sources. Includes loading states, empty states, and links to detailed views for each result type.
frontend/src/pages/Store.tsx: E-commerce store page that merges internal products with external products from multiple APIs, featuring search, category filtering, price filtering, and add-to-cart functionality. Implements debounced search and requires authentication for cart operations.
frontend/src/pages/UploadVideo.tsx: Video upload form with title, description, and file input fields, supporting files up to 100MB with upload progress tracking. Requires user authentication and uses ExternalBlob for chunked uploads.
frontend/src/pages/VideoDetail.tsx: Video player page displaying video metadata, uploader profile, like/unlike functionality, share button, and comments section. Requires authentication and handles video playback with controls.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutTracker.tsx: Displays user's logged workouts in a grid layout with hero section, empty state, and button to add new workouts. Requires authentication to view and manage workout history.
frontend/src/types/ExternalProduct.ts: TypeScript interface defining the structure of external products with id, name, price, imageUrl, externalUrl, and isExternal flag.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support. Includes functions to get, store, clear, and persist parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space (including sidebar, chart, and fitness-themed colors), typography, container queries, animations, custom fonts (Inter, Poppins), and keyframe animations for accordions and other UI elements.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting FIT AMIGO fitness platform development across 3 phases: Phase 1 (auth, e-commerce, workout tracker), Phase 2 (hybrid product catalog with Go Store API), Phase 3 (FiTube videos, Running Monitor, Food Tracker with AI, News Section with Web Search), now transitioning Store and FiTube to work independently with mock data.
